sections.heading: device or record; money used as a bet or stake; other property; forfeited to state; hearing
sections.text: In addition to any penalty provided in section 28-1102, 28-1103, 28-1104, 28-1105, 28-1105.01, or 28-1107, a sentencing court may order that any money, securities, negotiable instruments, firearms, conveyance
